page.title: 12School Provision-Winmarleigh
page.content: After passing through the village seat of learning all children travel to the secondary school of their choice. Recent years have seen the growth of excellent secondary and high schools in Lancaster,Garstang and Preesall. Depending upon current whims of parent or child most pupils have transferred at 11 to either,{Garstang High School {or Ripley S.Thomas,}Lancaster. Ripley has its own 6th form but those pupils at Garstang normally progress to{W.R.Tuson College,}Preston. A surprisingly high number of students have passed through the village school and eventually on to Polytechnics and Universities throughout the land in recent years. In the village is the{Winmarleigh {College}occupying the Hall and park,a minor part of{Lancashire College of {Agriculture.}
